description: when creating new tournament, it creates 6 errors Game "Game 1" overlaps with "Game 1" on field "Feld 1" Game "Game 1" overlaps with "SF1" on field "Feld 1" Game "Game 2" overlaps with "Game 2" on field "Feld 1" Game "Game 2" overlaps with "SF2" on field "Feld 1" Game "Game 3" overlaps with "Game 3" on field "Feld 1" Game "Game 3" overlaps with "Final" on field "Feld 1" and warnings to not separate stage Standing "Game 1" is used by 2 games Standing "Game 2" is used by 2 games Standing "Game 3" is used by 2 games
